name: nengi-2d-demo
description: nengi 2d example game with client-side prediction and lag compensation

scripts.start: npx concurrently "npx webpack-dev-server --config webpack.dev.js" "npx nodemon ./server/index.js --ignore public/"
scripts.start2: npx nodemon ./server/index.js --ignore public/ & npx webpack-dev-server --config webpack.dev.js

author: timetocode // Alex
